summary: This is a simple mod that will add four new vanilla female followers to your game. Morgana,Gialda,Datrya and Selina.They are not super hot because I wanted them to be immersive and to fit in  to the world.They can be found in the Nightgate inn.
descriptionHtml:
=========Description=========

This is a simple mod that will add four new vanilla female followers to your game. Morgana,Gialda,Datrya and Selina.They are not super hot because I wanted them to be immersive and to fit in to the world.They can be found in the Nightgate inn.


Morgana is a Nord.1H dagger

Gialda is an Imperial.1H sword

Datrya is a Breton. 1H sword

Selina is a Nord. 1H dagger

(All can use all weapons. These are just their starting items)


========Compatibility=========

Its compatible with all mods as far as i know


========Installization========
Copy/paste the files to your data folder in your skyrim directory, and make sure the N1m1k followers is ticked

=======Uninstalling========

Delete the esp and the textures (basically what you copied)


======Feuture updates======
Will add more races and male followers

========Credits=========
Bethesda for Skyrim and creation kit

Enjoy!!! :D
author: N1m1k
